title: Hypersegregated Cities
name: DmySgrg
description: Dummy variable for whether county is part of a hypersegregated city or its metropolitan area
source_long: Massey DS, Tannen J. A Research Note on Trends in Black Hypersegregation. Demography. 2015 Jun;52(3):1025-34. doi: 10.1007/s13524-015-0381-6. PMID: 25791615; PMCID: PMC4886656.
